section.title: &texify;: The &MiKTeX; Compiler Driver
section.para: texify is a command-line utility that simplifies the creation of &DVI; (&PDF;) documents: texify automatically runs LaTeX (pdfLaTeX), &MakeIndex; and BibTeX as many times as necessary to produce a &DVI; (&PDF;) file with sorted indices and all cross-references resolved.
